sig_info: Whenever Aarkus gains a non-Damaging Debuff, he has a 30 to 80% chance to Purify one of each non-Damaging Debuff on him. This cannot trigger more than once every 9.50 second(s).

PASSIVE: Aarkus reduces the potency of Power Drain, Steal, and Burn effects by 80%, and the duration of Power Lock effects by 50%.
Aarkus gains 15% less Power from landing and receiving Hits.
POWER OF SMOKEWORLD - BUFF - MAX: 5: Aarkus draws strength from the Smokeworld dimension at all times. He starts the fight with a Power Gain Buff, and gains 1 every 10 second(s).
These Buffs last indefinitely. The first one grants Aarkus 4% of a Bar of Power every 1 second(s), and every subsequent Power Gain Buff is 33.33% less effective.
He also gains one whenever his Power is Drained, Stolen, or Burned, and whenever he receives a Power Lock Debuff.
FROZEN AIR: While Aarkus has a Power Gain Buff, he freezes the area near him. Every 2.30 second(s) the Opponent spends near Aarkus, they gain an Armor Break Debuff, decreasing Armor Rating by 177.78 for 5 second(s). These Armor Breaks are capped at 10.
Armor Break Debuffs on the Opponent are Paused while they are near Aarkus.
While the Opponent is near Aarkus and they have an Armor Break or Armor Shattered Debuff, they also gain a Coldsnap Debuff, dealing 9.13 Energy damage every 0.50 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Hits from Special Attacks Pause all Armor Break Debuffs on the Opponent until the end of the Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit refreshes all Armor Break Debuffs on the Opponent.
If the Opponent is Armor Shattered, this Attack deals 149.4 bonus Energy damage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Remove all Armor Break Debuffs on the Opponent and replace them with both an Armor Break and Armor Shattered Debuff, that lasts 5 second(s) for each one removed.
The Armor Break reduces Armor Rating by 282.35 for each one replaced and removes an Armor Up Buff.
While Armor Shattered is active, this Champion cannot inflict additional Armor Break Debuffs.

While Armor Shattered is active, Opponent's Armor Up Buffs suffer -100% Ability Accuracy. Additionally, this shatters Robot Champions systems, reducing their Combat Power Rate and Ability Power Rate as well as their Ability Accuracy, by 100%.
If the Opponent was already Armor Shattered, instead this Attack deals 149.4 bonus Energy damage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Aarkus increases the area his abilities affect to cover the entire field for 20 second(s).
If the Opponent is Armor Shattered when this Attack is activated, gain a Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by 149.4 for 20 second(s).

While the Opponent is near Aarkus and they have an Armor Break or Armor Shattered Debuff, they also gain a Coldsnap Debuff, dealing 126.28 Energy damage every 0.50 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Hits from Special Attacks Pause all Armor Break Debuffs on the Opponent until the end of the Special Attack.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit refreshes all Armor Break Debuffs on the Opponent.
If the Opponent is Armor Shattered, this Attack deals 2066.4 bonus Energy damage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Remove all Armor Break Debuffs on the Opponent and replace them with both an Armor Break and Armor Shattered Debuff, that lasts 5 second(s) for each one removed.
The Armor Break reduces Armor Rating by 352.94 for each one replaced and removes an Armor Up Buff.
While Armor Shattered is active, this Champion cannot inflict additional Armor Break Debuffs.

While Armor Shattered is active, Opponent's Armor Up Buffs suffer -100% Ability Accuracy. Additionally, this shatters Robot Champions systems, reducing their Combat Power Rate and Ability Power Rate as well as their Ability Accuracy, by 100%.
If the Opponent was already Armor Shattered, instead this Attack deals 2066.4 bonus Energy damage.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Aarkus increases the area his abilities affect to cover the entire field for 20 second(s).
If the Opponent is Armor Shattered when this Attack is activated, gain a Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by 2066.4 for 20 second(s).

sig_info: Whenever Aarkus gains a non-Damaging Debuff, he has a 30 to 100% chance to Purify one of each non-Damaging Debuff on him. This cannot trigger more than once every 9.50 second(s).

PASSIVE: Aarkus reduces the potency of Power Drain, Steal, and Burn effects by 80%, and the duration of Power Lock effects by 50%.
Aarkus gains 15% less Power from landing and receiving Hits.
POWER OF SMOKEWORLD - BUFF - MAX: 5: Aarkus draws strength from the Smokeworld dimension at all times. He starts the fight with a Power Gain Buff, and gains 1 every 10 second(s).
These Buffs last indefinitely. The first one grants Aarkus 4% of a Bar of Power every 1 second(s), and every subsequent Power Gain Buff is 33.33% less effective.
He also gains one whenever his Power is Drained, Stolen, or Burned, and whenever he receives a Power Lock Debuff.
FROZEN AIR: While Aarkus has a Power Gain Buff, he freezes the area near him. Every 2.30 second(s) the Opponent spends near Aarkus, they gain an Armor Break Debuff, decreasing Armor Rating by 211.11 for 5 second(s). These Armor Breaks are capped at 10.
Armor Break Debuffs on the Opponent are Paused while they are near Aarkus.
